Government

1

  • About Pflugerville City Government

    Learn more about Pflugerville City Government including history and the government structure.

  • City Council & Mayor

    City Council positions are non-paid positions serving the residents of Pflugerville as a dedicated volunteer force.

  • Agendas & Minutes

    View agendas and minutes of each board and committee.

  • Boards & Commissions

    Discover the boards and commissions that drive your local government. Find agendas, member information, and other meeting details.

  • Departments

    Explore the departments that help to run Pflugerville.

  • Forms

    Complete and submit a form online.

  • Project Updates

    The Capital Improvement Program (CIP) plan identifies needed capital improvement projects and establishes an implementation schedule and funding source for these projects.
